name: Deathbringer
flavor_text: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."

frame.name: Dark Deliverance
frame.description:
Fires remotely detonated projectiles that drop Void orbs on combatants.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
Reduces weight for faster reloads.
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
  •  Decreases stability
perks.name: Alloy Casing

perks.description: The further a Void orb falls, the more powerful its detonation becomes.
perks.name: Dark Descent

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
